DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine feasibility program data collection protocol plan multisite clinical trial . The program , `` Stroll Safe '' , outdoor fall prevention program , take place lab space New York University occupational therapy department surround neighborhood . Twenty-four people meet inclusion criterion enrol informed consent . Recruitment include follow people express interest fall prevention program survey study conduct PI , interested member community-based program senior agree community partner study . Twelve participant assign 7-week program 12 receive write information outdoor fall prevention ( control group ) . The topic address week , 7-week outdoor fall prevention program , treatment manual developed , base result survey conduct community dwell old adult identify gap knowledge use prevention strategy , related literature . The program include pre-set module , however , participant able voice individual concern problem-solve solution group discussion . Using ecological perspective , Health Belief Model , problem solve theory guide , intervention include didactic component , group problem solving , practical application strategy , self-advocacy regard reporting problem city . Analysis primarily focus process measures.Post-intervention , semi-structures interview conduct analyzed assess strengths/limitations program participant 's attribution behavioral change intervention . Although statistical significant anticipate small feasibility study , repeat measure ANOVA use examine change Falls Efficacy Scale-International ( FES-I ) , Outdoor Falls Questionnaire ( OFQ ) Falls Behavioral Scale Older Person ( FaB ) score pre post-test treatment control group . Effect size ( Cohen 's ) also calculate . Change number stumble , trip , slip , fall program also analyze . Data collect fall self-efficacy strategy use study enrollment ( Baseline ) , completion 7 week program ( 1st Post-test ) , 2 month post-program completion ( 2nd Post-test ) . Participants ask keep daily diary stumble , trip , slip , fall time enroll study two month follow completion program .
DOC.brief_title: Stroll Safe Outdoor Fall Prevention Program
DOC.criteria: 55 year age old English speaking Cognitively competent ( i.e . Montreal Cognitive Impairment ( MOCA ) score > 24 ) Able ambulate outdoors independently without assistive device Able travel independently program site Have sustain stumble , trip , slip fall outdoors within last year Younger age 55 Living institutional set NonEnglish speaker Requiring assistance outdoor ambulation and/or community mobility Cognitively impaired per MOCA score An active medical , neurological psychiatric disease interfere participation ( e.g . stroke , chronic obstructive pulmonary disease require supplemental oxygen , Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis , schizophrenia ) .
